titles.title: A bill to clarify Indian treaties and executive orders with respect to fishing rights.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 100-111.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Inouye with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 100-53.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 113.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Received in the Senate; returned by the House pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 479.

bill.summary: 5/13/1987--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) Prohibits the imposition of any Federal, State, or local tax on income derived by an Indian tribe from the exercise of fishing rights secured by any treaty, executive order, or Act of Congress.
